(Associated Press) NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Security officials quickly pulled the man away as he tried to hide under Ferrera's voluminous gown before the Friday premiere of "How to Train Your Dragon 2." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR It was a bizarre incident on a red carpet renowned for its strict decorum. The man was later identified as Vitalii Sediuk, a Ukrainian prankster known for such stunts. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Yet Ferrera didn't seem ruffled on the carpet and was in good spirits at the movie's after-party, laughing with guests and taking pictures. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR She declined comment on the incident, however, and festival organizers didn't immediately return messages about the matter.
